function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ambiguity in defining system states and their corresponding performance metrics","Impact":"Misinterpretation of resilience measures and miscalculation of system performance","Mitigation":"Provide clear definitions and standardized performance metrics for system states","Technologies":"Standardized performance measurement tools and software","People":"System developers, engineers, and researchers","Owner":"System developers, researchers, and standardization organizations"},{"Description":"Complexity of the time-dependent resilience metric equation","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding and calculating the resilience metric, leading to potential errors in resilience assessment","Mitigation":"Provide detailed explanations and examples of the time-dependent resilience metric equation","Technologies":"Visualization tools, educational materials, and simulation software","People":"Researchers, analysts, and engineers","Owner":"Research institutions, educational institutions, and industry organizations"},{"Description":"Ambiguity in notation and terminology","Impact":"Confusion and inconsistency in the interpretation of resilience measures and metrics","Mitigation":"Adopt standardized notations and terminology for resilience measures and metrics","Technologies":"Standardized notation guidelines and terminology databases","People":"Researchers, practitioners, and educators","Owner":"Standardization organizations and academic institutions"}]}
